description:
Situated in the growing Harmony estate, Click Realty proudly brings this stunning three-bedroom home to market. Offering modern finishes throughout, low maintenance spaces and one of the best value-for-money investments on the Sunshine Coast, the only thing left to do is welcome you home.

Whether you’re a savvy investor, an astute homeowner or looking for your first house, this one ticks all the boxes. Built less than two years ago and having minimal use throughout its time, this home will feel like buying brand new. Featuring three generous-sized bedrooms, with the master including a window alcove, air conditioning, a large walk-in wardrobe and a tasteful ensuite. The two additional bedrooms are serviced by an equally impressive bathroom that complements the ensuite, with ceiling fans and double sliding door built-in robes.

Providing a seamless flow, the home showcases vinyl timber flooring from the entrance right through to the alfresco. The modern look makes the home feel open and spacious. Attention to detail was vital in the building of this home. Simple yet subtle colour schemes give you a sense of calm while providing a fantastic, homely feeling.

At the centre of the home, you will be welcomed by the simple yet elegantly designed kitchen, offering caesarstone benchtops, a built-in dishwasher, and an abundance of storage. Breakfast is a breeze, with the island bench overhanging perfectly for you to enjoy the most important meal of the day.

You’ll enjoy comfort all year round, with ceiling fans throughout and air-conditioning in the living area and master bedroom. The single-car garage provides internal access and additional length to house the laundry. The property is low in maintenance, with pebbles down both sides, a modest section of grass at the rear for kids and pets to play and a small garden in the front offering street appeal and privacy.

Harmony is one of the fastest growing communities in Australia, already home to well over 1500 homes and planned to grow to 4800 homes at completion. The estate already has a thriving family community with Palmview State Primary School and Palmview State Special School open, along with the High School well under construction, due to open in the first semester of 2023. Future progress is also underway with the major highway access road started construction and is due for completion in early 2023.

With planned commercial spaces, including shopping, eateries and convenience stores, investing in the Harmony estate is one of the most viable decisions you can make as a homeowner or investor.

Features to fall in love with:

- 3 generous-sized bedrooms
- WIR, ensuite, air-conditioning and window alcove to master
- Modern-looking vinyl timber flooring
- Ceiling fans throughout, plus additional air-conditioning for living
- Stylish kitchen, including dishwasher and abundance of storage
- Additional stylish bathroom
- Solar system installed
- Low-maintenance yard with a section of grass for children and pets
- Minutes to shops, amenities, schools and university

Property Code: 33
